about_the_game:
With DLC Sprite sheet maker for Clip Maker you will get an excellent tool which allow you to generate animated sprite sheets of loaded VRoid characters, your own characters, objects, VFXs or dozens of thousands of characters, animals, monsters, creatures, VFXs or objects included in the game and then use it in any place where you would like.

You can manipulate with the personages and objects as you would like, means that you can make sprites of any side or top down.

Generating of the animated sprite sheet is very easy, create a timeline, add there a personage or object which you want, select any of thousands included animations and by clicking just one button make dozens cool sprites!

Also using the game tools you may set up animation's start and end time and the frame repeat rate to make your sprite sheets perfect.

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the menu where you are making settings of the timeline.
